DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional study intend collect epidemiological data patient stable kidney function renal transplantation , receive Tacrolimus Sandoz© accord approve indication .
DOC.brief_title: Non-interventional-study With Tacrolimus Sandoz© Capsules Prophylaxis Renal Graft Rejection
DOC.criteria: Age : ≥ 18 Post renal transplantation time : ≥ 6 month Stable kidney function ( serum creatinine < 3.0mg/dl ; variation < 0.5mg/dl 2 appointment minimum distance 6 day ) Stable Tacrolimus Sandoz© dose > 2 week inclusion Non Interventional Study ( NIS ) Written oral inform consent Wellknown poor compliance immunosuppressive Acute rejection reaction within past 3 month antibodytherapy rejection within past 6 month
